element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm computes a constrained delaunay traingulation of a set of points and using the lines from a lines layer as constraints.
A constrained Delaunay triangulation is a generalization of the Delaunay triangulation that forces certain required segments into the triangulation. In these case, those segments are taken from the aforementioned lines layer.

element.name: POINTS
element.text: The layer with points to triangulate.
